title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Operational
body: Operational          Long term volunteer opportunities offer an exciting chance to stay in or close to the park. You can truly explore all that Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Southern Nevada have to offer. All announcements will take you to volunteer.gov where details of the position are available and the opportunity to apply online. Positions change often so be sure to check our site regularly. If you have a skill or talent you would like to share with us and do not see an opportunity, please feel free to submit your application.  Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
